regen.absent_element: replacement of a departed user with a Computer Opponent (CO)
regen.new_specification: If a user leaves the game before it concludes, a Computer Opponent will take over their role to continue the game.

regen.absent_element: situation where a new CO takes the place of a departing user
regen.new_specification: If a user departs early, the system shall automatically assign a new Computer Opponent (CO) to occupy their position in the game.

regen.absent_element: situation of a CO taking over when a user leaves early
regen.new_specification: If a user departs early from the game, a new Computer Opponent (CO) will assume the role of the user who left.

label: If a user leaves the game prematurely, a new CO is created to fill their place.
absence: creation of a new CO to fill the place of a user leaving the game prematurely
